Package to.sven.androidrccar.common.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConnectionProblemException
    This Exception is used to tell the ILogicListener in ILogicListener.connectionLost(to.sven.androidrccar.common.exception.ConnectionProblemException) that a problem occurred.
    InvalidMessageException
    This Exception is thrown, when a Message contains invalid data.
    RangeException
    Thrown if an passed argument is outside of its acceptable range.
    UnsupportedMessageException
    This Exception is thrown, when the Message-Type is not supported in the current state.
